verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: will] announce his decision about whether to keep the United States in the Iran nuclear agreement on Tuesday at 2 p.m. , the president tweeted Monday . Meanwhile America ’s European allies are scrambling to preserve deal .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: announce] [ARG1: his decision about whether to keep the United States in the Iran nuclear agreement on Tuesday at 2 p.m.] , the president tweeted Monday . Meanwhile America ’s European allies are scrambling to preserve deal .
